overview:
Jeff Pashalides is a Vice President ofUnion Square Advisors. Prior to joining Union Square, Mr. Pashalides was an Associate in the Technology Mergers & Acquisitions Group at Credit Suisse.

Mr. Pashalides has six years of investment banking experience and has advised companies such as ADVA, Axis Systems, Chiron, Cibernet, Concur, Conexant Systems, Digital Impact, DigitalThink, FEI Company, HNC Software, Innovative Merchant Solutions, Loudcloud, McDATA, Mobile 365, Oracle, Qpass and VeriSign.
